titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution authorizing the President to disapprove or reduce an item of appropriations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/11/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Grants the President the authority to reduce or disapprove any item of appropriation in any Act or joint resolution, except any item of appropriation for the legislative branch.
